trans-unit.resname: P04·1 | Powder Keg | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: P04·1 | Powder Keg | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy each artifact and creature with mana value equal to the number of fuse counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy each artifact and creature with mana value equal to the number of fuse counters on CARDNAME.
